spiritsExplanation:
The workout is primarily classified under "Structured & Disciplined" with a score of 0.7 due to its methodical nature outlined in both the video title and description. The title mentions a 'Preparation Phase,' indicating a structured, progressive approach to training. The description includes phrases like 'circuit-based workout,' 'fundamental compound movements,' and 'prepare you for strength training,' which emphasize a systematic and disciplined progression. The detailed breakdown in the video timeline (e.g., rounds, reps, and how to perform them) further supports this structured methodology.

"Flow & Rhythm" receives a lesser score of 0.3 as there may be an element of rhythm inherent in the circuit training format, aiming for a smooth transition between exercises, although it is not explicitly emphasized as a major focus.

The spirits "High-Energy & Intense" and "Soothing & Restorative" are excluded due to the beginner-level and preparation focus rather than high-intensity or relaxation. "Sport & Agility" and "Outdoor & Adventure" are also excluded, as there is no sports-specific or outdoor emphasis in the metadata.
